name: Tesla Model S
description: A luxury all-electric sedan with impressive acceleration, a long driving range, and advanced autopilot features.

name: Ford Mustang
description: A classic American muscle car known for its powerful V8 engine, sporty handling, and iconic design.

name: Chevrolet Camaro
description: A high-performance sports car with sharp handling, aggressive styling, and available V8 engine options.

name: BMW X5
description: A luxury SUV offering a blend of sporty performance, refined interior, and advanced technology features.

name: Mercedes-Benz C-Class
description: A premium sedan with sleek design, cutting-edge technology, and a comfortable, high-quality interior.

name: Audi A4
description: A compact luxury sedan that combines style, performance, and technology for an enjoyable driving experience.

name: Toyota Camry
description: A reliable and fuel-efficient midsize sedan with a comfortable interior and a reputation for longevity.

name: Honda Civic
description: A popular compact car offering excellent fuel efficiency, reliable performance, and advanced safety features.

name: Jeep Wrangler
description: A rugged off-road SUV with iconic styling, removable doors, and exceptional off-road capabilities.

name: Hyundai Sonata
description: A midsize sedan offering a comfortable ride, advanced safety features, and a sleek modern design.
